email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 15,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Could you provide us with your best freight rate and available vessel options? We are aiming for a laycan of 15-20 October. Looking forward to your response. Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear John, Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 25,000 and LOA of 180m, for your shipment. Our starting freight rate is USD 35/MT on a CIF basis. The vessel is available within your requested laycan. Please let us know if this works for you. Best regards, Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, Thank you for your prompt response. We find the rate of USD 35/MT a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising it to USD 30/MT? We are very interested in finalizing this deal soon. Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear John, Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 32/MT. This is our best offer considering the current demand and vessel availability. Please confirm your acceptance at your earliest convenience. Best regards, Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, We accept your revised offer of USD 32/MT. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and send us the recap for confirmation. Thank you for your cooperation. Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear John, Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and send you the recap shortly. The vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE is confirmed for your shipment with a laycan of 15-20 October. Best regards, Laura Smith
